text:
Cloud workload protection 
can be complex and costly,

and requires real-time holistic accurate, 
contextual visibility into security risks

within your cloud workloads 
— including at runtime.

That’s why tens of thousands of 
customers across virtually every

industry and geography use Amazon GuardDuty
to protect their AWS accounts, data,
and resources with intelligent threat detection.

GuardDuty provides out-of-the-box, easy-to-use
threat detection for your organization
that can be activated with a single step.

GuardDuty simplifies threat detection 
across AWS compute, serverless, containers,

and data stores using machine learning, anomaly 
detection, and integrated threat intelligence

to identify and prioritize 
potential threats quickly.

GuardDuty can analyze tens of billions of events 
per minute across multiple AWS data sources.

It identifies unusual activity 
within your accounts,

analyzes  the security relevance of the activity,
and gives the context in which it was

invoked—so you can mitigate threats earlier,
and initiate automated responses with seamless

integrations with downstream services
to scale threat detection quickly and easily
across your AWS environment.

With GuardDuty, you pay as you go
with no additional costs.
Get started with your 30-day free trial today,

and experience how you can
protect your AWS environment

with intelligent threat 
detection from Amazon GuardDuty.
